mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, cc.* FROM (SELECT info_id as infoId, i_no as iNo, i_title as iTitle, i_content as iContent, i_regdate as iRegDate, i_image as iImage, i_del_yn as iDelYN FROM INFO where i_del_yn = 'N' )cc ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT info_id as infoId, i_no as iNo, i_title as iTitle, i_content as iContent, i_regdate as iRegDate, i_image as iImage, i_del_yn as iDelYN FROM INFO where i_no = #{i_no} and i_del_yn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM INFO

select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order BY i_No ASC) as NUM, info.info_id as infoId, i_no as iNo, i_title as iTitle, i_content as iContent, i_regdate as iRegDate, i_image as iImage, i_del_yn as iDelYN from INFO_GROUP left join info on(info_group.info_ID = info.info_id) where info_group.info_ID = info.info_id and info_name = '공지사항' and i_del_yn = 'N') where NUM between 1 and 5
